page.title: 04The Mayor of Hereford.
page.content: In July we went to see the{Mayor. His name is Mr.Stroucken but we had to call him Mr.Mayor.A Mayor is the {Chairman}of the{City Council.}The City is divided into 9 wards. Three people represent each ward which makes 27 people altogether. At the end of January one person is chosen to be Mayor and Chairman of the City Council and takes office in May. The previous Mayor becomes{Deputy Mayor. There has been a Mayor in Hereford since 1833. Our Mayor is the 604th to serve the city. When they have Committee meetings the Councillors sit at a horse-shoe shaped table. The Mayor has completely free access to the{Town Hall. When one of the{Royal Family}comes to Hereford the Mayor is the first person to meet them.
